title: Google News Feed Settings Inaccessible
content:
Once accidentally choose Always for launching email on Outlook Account from icon in Google News Feed. Want to change settings to Always Ask, but can't find settings.

In earlier post Diamond Product Expert Scott posted a solution and another expert marked the answer Recommended, but b the solution did not work.

Scott then posted another answer then closed the thread but the other answer didn't work either. Here's the second answer from Scott:

"Sorry left out a step. Go to apps and notification, show apps. Then tap the three dots on the top right and show system. Then you should see Google news."

But neither Google News nor News appears in the list. Very frustrating. Thanks in advance for any other help.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
